Will this work for 0.24.2?

It's just a part, and it doesn't appear to depend on any .25 plugin changes, so yes. Just make sure you have the right version of B9 (5.2.4 I think). Looking at the cfg it looks like the scaling issue ultrasquid mentioned won't be an issue since there's no part scaling here anyway.
